values.text: Welcome, how can I assist you?

concat.scalar:
**Welcome to Delicious Den!** Our restaurant, founded by a passionate couple who love food, operates from **10 am to 10 pm** daily. We pride ourselves on using fresh, local produce to create 

our dishes, ensuring quality and supporting local farmers. Currently, we have one location where we serve our delightful meals. While we do not open for breakfast,
**we do offer delivery services** so you can enjoy our delicious food at your convenience. Come and experience the warmth and flavors of Delicious Den!
